description: A SpaceX Starlink satellite suffered a major in-orbit failure in December 2025, losing communication after venting its fuel tank and beginning an uncontrolled orbital descent. The malfunction caused the satellite’s altitude to drop and produced minor debris, prompting close tracking by SpaceX, NASA and the U.S. Space Force. High-resolution imagery from Maxar/Vantor’s WorldView-3 satellite confirmed the spacecraft was largely intact. The incident highlights both the risks of large satellite constellations and the growing role of rapid orbital monitoring in space safety.
title: Failing Starlink Satellite Photographed in Orbit Before Fiery Reentry

description: The OTT platforms are ready to drop some intense dramas, thrillers, romance, and more for the week. Top releases include Stranger Things Vol 2, Ek Deewane Ki Deewaniyat, Nobody 2, and more.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Dec 22 - Dec 28): Ek Deewane Ki Deewaniyat, Revolver Rita, Middle Class, Stranger Things S5 Vol 2, and More

description: South Korean startup Innospace failed during its first orbital launch attempt as the Hanbit-Nano rocket crashed about a minute after liftoff from Brazil. The mission marked the country’s first private orbital launch effort and carried satellites from Brazil and India. The cause of the failure remains unclear, and the company is expected to investigate the anomaly.
title: South Korean Startup Innospace Fails on First Orbital Launch Attempt of Hanbit-Nano Rocket

description: Astronomers have detected strange wobbling jets in the rare sun-facing tail of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS. Observed as the comet neared the Sun, the shifting jets reveal new details about how material escapes from comets formed around other stars, offering rare insight into alien planetary systems.
title: Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Shows Wobbling Jets in Rare Sun-Facing Tail, Surprising Astronomers

description: POSTECH researchers have developed a “dream battery” using magnetic control of lithium to prevent dendrite formation. The hybrid anode stores lithium safely, offers four times the capacity of graphite, and sustains stable cycling, creating a safer high-energy solution for EVs and energy storage.
title: Magnetic Control of Lithium Enables Safer, High-Capacity “Dream Battery” Without Explosion Risk

description: Russia’s Energia rocket company has patented a rotating space station concept designed to generate artificial gravity for astronauts. The system would use spinning habitable modules to simulate half of Earth’s gravity, potentially reducing health risks linked to long missions as the International Space Station nears retirement.
title: Russia Patents Rotating Space Station Concept to Generate Artificial Gravity in Orbit

description: Vritta is a Kannada psychological thriller film that revolves around a troubled man fighting for survival after he gets stuck in a dense forest. Streaming soon.
title: Vritta OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Baahubali: The Epic (2025) is trending across social platforms and entertainment portals as fans gear up to revisit the legendary Baahubali universe. The re-release has generated high anticipation due to its remastered presentation and nostalgic appeal. Discussions around the cast, storyline, streaming availability and cinematic scale continue to boost engagement, keeping the Baahubali brand strongly relevant among global viewers.
title: Baahubali: The Epic Now Available for Streaming Online: Everything You Need to Know

description: De De Pyaar De 2 is an Ajay Devgan starrer film that is expected to stream digitally soon. The film explores themes of comedy, romance, and drama.
title: De De Pyaar De 2 OTT Release Update: Know Everything About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: Scientists warn global warming may overshoot, triggering extreme cooling and possibly the next ice age through ocean carbon and nutrient cycles.
title: Global Warming May Overshoot and Trigger the Next Ice Age, Say Scientists

description: Paradise (2024) is a critically acclaimed Malayalam film directed by Prasanna Vithanage and presented by Mani Ratnam. With strong performances from Roshan Mathew and Darshana Rajendran, the film explores love, privilege, power, and emotional vulnerability during a tense trip to Sri Lanka. Paradise is now streaming on Netflix India.
title: Paradise (2024) Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know

description: Rajini Gaang is a Tamil Horror-comedy film that is landing on Prime Video tonight. The film has been written and directed by M. Ramesh Baarathi.
title: Rajini Gaang OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Weapons (2025) is a suspense-driven thriller directed by Zach Cregger that dives into power struggles, morality, and survival. With layered characters and emotional depth, the film delivers high-impact drama and tension. Strong critical response and audience buzz make it a notable 2025 theatrical and OTT release for thriller fans.
title: Weapons OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G and the Realme 16 Pro 5G are scheduled to launch in India on January 6, 2026, as the latest additions to the company's lineup. Weeks before its unveiling in the country, purported images of its Realme 16 Pro+ 5G have surfaced online, revealing its box price in India, dimensions, and display size. Soon after its debut, the phone will be available for purchase via Flipkart and the Realme India online store. It is confirmed to feature a triple rear camera unit, headlined by a 200-megapixel main shooter.
title: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G Price in India Leaked as Tipster Reveals Retail Box Ahead of Launch on January 6

description: Red Magic 11 Air will be launched soon in China, a company executive has confirmed. The smartphone will be the third phone in the lineup, which currently includes the Red Magic 11 Pro and Red Magic 11 Pro+. It will be unveiled in the country as the successor to the Red Magic 10 Air, which was unveiled in April. The smartphone is tipped to be powered by Qualcomm's octa core Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. It is said to feature an active cooling fan, too.
title: Red Magic 11 Air Launch Confirmed; Tipster Hints at Presence of Snapdragon 8 Elite Chip

description: Samsung is reportedly planning to expand smartphone display manufacturing in India after applying for incentives under the government’s PLI scheme. The company is expected to move beyond device assembly and increase local value addition at its Noida facility, its largest smartphone manufacturing plant globally. Samsung reportedly does not plan to shift production from Vietnam but may add new capacity in India as demand grows. The company is also said to be open to sourcing chips locally and sees India as a key export and growth hub.
title: Samsung Reportedly Plans to Expand India Manufacturing With Focus on Phone Displays, May Source Chips From India

description: OnePlus Nord 6 could launch soon globally, as the rumoured smartphone has been spotted on the SIRIM certification website in Malaysia. The handset is expected to be the rebranded version of the OnePlus Ace 6. It is said to be powered by last year's flagship octa core Snapdragon 8 Elite chip from Qualcomm. The handset might carry a dual rear camera setup, featuring a 50-megapixel primary shooter.
title: OnePlus Nord 6 Visits SIRIM Certification Website, Could Launch Soon: Expected Features, Specifications

description: Samsung is reportedly nearing the launch of its next-generation Galaxy Book laptops, with the Galaxy Book 6 Pro and Galaxy Book 6 Ultra appearing on the Bluetooth SIG database ahead of CES 2026. The listing suggests an imminent debut at the January tech event in Las Vegas. Earlier Geekbench data hints that the Galaxy Book 6 Pro could feature Intel’s Core Ultra 5 338H processor, up to 32GB RAM, and AI-focused performance. Samsung is also expected to unveil additional Galaxy Book variants and broader AI-driven products.
title: Samsung Galaxy Book 6 Ultra, Galaxy Book 6 Pro Listed on Bluetooth SIG Database Ahead of CES 2026

description: At Gadgets 360, we reviewed over a dozen games across PC, PlayStation, and mobile in 2025. But the best game we reviewed this year was Death Stranding 2: On the Beach. The sequel to Death Stranding expands the gameplay of its predecessor, while telling a better, more emotional story. Here's why Death Stranding 2 remains a unique experience in gaming.
title: The Best Game We Reviewed in 2025: Why Death Stranding 2 Is a Masterpiece for a Fractured World

description: Apple is reportedly exploring new deals with RAM suppliers as the price of the iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone Air's 12GB LPDDR5x RAM has increased exponentially. Primarily sourced from Samsung, the RAM was initially priced between $25 (about Rs. 2,200) and $29 (about Rs. 2,600) per unit when the “initial contract” was signed between Apple and Samsung, a tech blogger claims. However, the same now costs $70 (roughly Rs. 6,300) per unit, representing a jump of more than 230 percent.
title: Apple Expected to Pay 230 Percent Premium for iPhone 17 Pro RAM Chips In 2026: Report

description: Apple has been rumoured to be developing a foldable iPhone for years now. Leaks have suggested that the purported handset could finally see the light of day in 2026. According to a recent YouTube video involving a breakdown of its CAD renders, the book-style foldable, ubiquitously known as the iPhone Fold, could adopt a wide-display design. While it may lean closer to the Google Pixel Fold’s proportions, the iPhone Fold could feature a noticeably minimal screen crease.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone Seen in Leaked Renders With Pixel Fold-Like Design, Minimal Crease

description: Middle Class is a Tamil drama film streaming on Z5 that highlights the emotional struggles and aspirations of middle-class families. Featuring Munishkanth and Kaali Venkat, the movie delivers a relatable story rooted in realism and heartfelt moments.
title: Middle Class Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know About This Tamil Movie

description: A group of authors, including New York Times reporter John Carreyrou, has filed a copyright lawsuit against several major AI companies, alleging unauthorised use of their books to train models. Defendants named in the complaint include Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, Perplexity, and xAI, the first time the Elon Musk-owned AI firm has been sued on such grounds. The authors are seeking damages and detailed disclosures of training data use.
title: New York Times Reporter, Authors Sue Google, OpenAI, Meta Over AI-Based Copyright Infringement

description: Power Book IV: Force Season 3 is a crime drama series that will return for the last time soon on the digital screens.
title: Power Book IV: Force Season 3 OTT Release Date: Everything You Need to Know About Streaming, Plot, and More

description: Tere Ishk Mein, starring Dhanush and Kriti Sanon, is a romantic drama directed by Anand L Rai that blends love with revenge and emotional conflict. Following its successful theatrical run, the film is expected to stream soon on OTT, creating strong anticipation among viewers.
title: Tere Ishk Mein OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed: When and Where to Watch it Online??

description: The Sony WF-C710N stood out as the best audio product I reviewed in 2025 by getting the fundamentals right. Priced at Rs. 8,990, it delivered a well-balanced mix of comfort, sound quality, effective ANC, and long battery life without feeling compromised. Its all-day usability, consistent tuning, and thoughtful features made it easy to live with, ultimately winning on everyday practicality over rivals that either cut corners to hit lower prices or offered more natural sound with clear trade-offs.
title: The Best ANC Earbuds Under Rs. 10,000? Why the Sony WF-C710N is My 2025 Favourite

description: Crypto markets traded cautiously on Wednesday as Bitcoin and Ethereum extended consolidation amid thin holiday liquidity. Reduced participation, derivatives activity, and tax-loss harvesting weighed on sentiment ahead of a key options expiry. Analysts said volatility remains elevated in the short term, while a clearer direction may emerge once holiday conditions fade and excess leverage is flushed.
title: Crypto Markets Stay Range-Bound, Traders Wary as Liquidity Remains Thin

description: Microsoft engineer Galen Hunt clarified that Microsoft is not rewriting Windows in Rust using AI, despite earlier speculation sparked by his post about migrating large codebases from C++ to Rust. Hunt said his comments referred to a multi-year research effort to improve language-migration tooling, and hiring engineers to explore safer, scalable translation techniques, not to redefine Windows’ core development strategy.
title: Fact Check: Is Microsoft Really Planning to Rewrite Windows 11 in Rust Using AI?

description: ISRO successfully launched the US-built BlueBird Block-2 communications satellite aboard its heavy-lift LVM3 rocket from Sriharikota. Weighing 6.1 tonnes, the satellite was placed into a 520-kilometre low Earth orbit to support space-based cellular broadband for smartphones. The fully commercial mission, conducted for AST SpaceMobile, highlights India’s rising stature as a reliable and competitive launch provider in the global space industry.
title: ISRO’s LVM3 Rocket Successfully Launches US BlueBird Block-2 Satellite

description: The Oppo K15 Turbo Pro is tipped to debut with a new MediaTek Dimensity 9500s chipset, according to a fresh leak, and not previously suggested Snapdragon processors. The phone is said to retain its gaming focus, with a 6.78-inch 1.5K LTPS OLED display, a 50-megapixel main camera, a large battery, and a built-in active cooling fan. The leak also suggests Oppo may expand fan cooling to cheaper models, though final specifications remain unclear.
title: Oppo K15 Turbo Pro Tipped to Launch With New MediaTek Dimensity 9500s Chip

description: Realme Pad 3 5G will be launched in India on January 6, 2026. The dedicated microsite for the Realme 16 Pro series was updated to confirm the launch of the new tablet. Additionally, the Realme Pad 3 5G is now listed on the company website, revealing that it would be equipped with a 12,200mAh battery, a dual rear camera setup, and a 2K resolution display. It is confirmed to be available in at least black and gold colourways.
title: Realme Pad 3 5G India Launch Date Announced; Will Arrive With 12,200mAh Battery

description: Samsung will showcase the 6K 3D Odyssey G9, Odyssey 3D, and several other monitors at the CES 2026. The company's 2026 lineup is led by the 6K 3D Odyssey G9, which is claimed to have a 6K display with glasses-free 3D technology. The South Korea-based tech conglomerate will also showcase Odyssey 3D, Odyssey G6, Odyssey G8, and Odyssey OLED G8, equipped with up to 240Hz high refresh rate, large screens, and gaming-focused features.
title: Samsung 6K 3D Odyssey G9, Four Other Monitors Unveiled Ahead of CES 2026

description: Samsung has reportedly cancelled the Galaxy S26 Edge, signalling a pullback from ultra-thin smartphones after weak demand in 2025. Poor sales of the Galaxy S25 Edge and Apple’s iPhone Air suggest buyers prefer better battery life, cameras, and performance over slim designs. The S25 Edge faced criticism for its small battery and missing telephoto camera. With Apple also scaling back its ultra-thin plans and Samsung lacking silicon-carbon batteries, both companies appear to be prioritising practicality over extreme thinness.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge Plans Reportedly Dropped Amidst Poor Sales of Ultra-Thin Phones

description: 007 First Light, the upcoming James Bond action-adventure game from IO Interactive, has been delayed by two months. The game will now launch on May 27, 2026, on PC, PS5, Xbox Series S/X, and PC. Developer IO Interactive said it needed the additional development time to further polish and refine the game.
title: 007 First Light Delayed by Two Months, Will Now Launch on May 27, 2026

description: Google is offering a limited-time 50 percent discount on the annual Google AI Pro plan for eligible new subscribers in select regions, cutting the first-year price in half. The deal runs until January 15 and includes access to premium features like Gemini 3 Pro, Nano Banana Pro, Deep Research, and 2 TB of cloud storage. A similar 50 percent cut is also available on Google One annual plans for new users.
title: Google One, Gemini Annual Plan Prices Slashed By Half for Limited Period: Details

description: The Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold was launched in select global markets last month as the company’s first triple foldable smartphone. Questions were raised about its durability due to the existence of triple screens and their hinge mechanisms, although Samsung said that it had undergone a rigorous testing process. A South Korea-based YouTube channel put the company’s claims to the test by putting the Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold through a fold test, where its hinge began to give way at about 1.4 lakh folds.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Hinge Survives Around 150,000 Folds in Durability Test on YouTube

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra will be launched by the Chinese smartphone maker on December 25. The smartphone will be the fourth model in the tech firm’s flagship smartphone lineup. The company has already teased the design and a few camera specifications of the upcoming handset. A day before its much-anticipated debut, the smartphone maker has announced that it will also launch a Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica Edition. Separately, a tipster has revealed that the handset will feature a zoom feature.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica Edition Launch Confirmed; Could Feature Rotary Dial Around Camera Module

description: OnePlus Turbo is tipped to feature a custom 1.5K LTPS display from BOE with a 165Hz refresh rate, according to tipster Digital Chat Station. The screen is said to use a self-developed Display P3 lite chip and flagship-grade luminescent materials to improve colour accuracy, reduce power consumption, and extend lifespan. It may also support high-frequency PWM dimming for better eye protection and slim bezels, making it a standout BOE display in its price segment.
title: OnePlus Turbo Tipped to Launch With 1.5K BOE Display With 165Hz Refresh Rate

description: Oppo Pad Air 5 will be launched in China on December 25 as the successor to the Pad Air 2. A day ahead of its much-anticipated unveiling, a YouTube channel has uploaded a purported unboxing video of the tablet, revealing its design and in-box accessories. The upcoming Pad Air 5 is shown to ship with a 45W charging adapter, while it is confirmed to support 33W wired fast charging. Recently, the tech firm confirmed that its tablet will feature a 10,050mAh battery and a 12.1-inch dispaly with 2.8K resolution.
title: Oppo Pad Air 5 Unboxing Video Reveals Additional Design Details, Accessories

description: Oppo is gearing up to introduce several new smartphones early next year, including a foldable and a flagship model. A tipster has now leaked the launch timeline of two of the anticipated devices, whose launches have reportedly been accelerated by the company. The Oppo Find N6 has been rumoured to be in development for some time, and could debut in China before the Chinese New Year. It is tipped to be followed by the Find X9 Ultra.
title: Oppo Find N6, Oppo Find X9 Ultra China Launch Timeline Leaked; May Debut in Q1 2026

description: The Realme Pad 3 is rumoured to be launched in India soon, more than two years after the introduction of the Pad 2. It is expected to arrive alongside the Realme 16 Pro Series 5G on January 6. Ahead of launch, key specifications of the upcoming tablet have been leaked. According to a tipster, the Realme Pad 3 will be equipped with a 2.8K LCD screen. It may support wired charging at 45W.
title: Realme Pad 3 Key Specifications Tipped Ahead of India Launch; to Feature 2.8K Display and 45W Wired Charging
